section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before continuing with the install.

step.title: Downloading the source code

important.para: Git is used to manage Mobicents JAIN SLEE source code. Instructions for downloading, installing and using Git can be found at

step.para: Use Git to checkout a specific release source, the Git repository URL is https://code.google.com/p/jain-slee/ , then switch to the specific release version, lets consider &THIS.VERSION;.

step.title: Building the source code

important.para: Maven 2.0.9 (or higher) is used to build the release. Instructions for using Maven2, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use Maven to build the deployable unit binary.
Once the process finishes you should have the SNMP 'snmp-adaptor.sar' directory artifact in the adaptor/target directory.

section.title: Installing &THIS.PLATFORM; SNMP Adaptor
section.para: To install the tool to the &JEE.PLATFORM; simply copy the provided snmp-adaptor.sar directory into the deploy directory of the target server profile.

section.title: Uninstalling &THIS.PLATFORM; SNMP Adaptor
section.para: To uninstall the tool from the &JEE.PLATFORM; simply delete the snmp-adaptor.sar directory from the deploy directory of the target server profile.
